verbose_text: After a magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) showing the presence of a " frontal-temporal cerebral atrophy, " the patient underwent lumbar puncture with cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) proteomics research (ie, beta-amyloid, tau protein, and tau phosphorylated), and polymerase chain reaction (PCR) neurotropic viruses research (namely EBV, CMV, HSV-1, HS EBV, CMV, HSV-1, HSV-2, HSV-8-2, HS-8).
